product_name: The North Face Glacier 1/4-Zip Fleece Top - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering cozy warmth and an athletic fit, The North Face Glacier quarter-zip fleece girls' top can be worn as a sweatshirt or as a midlayer while skiing or sledding. Lightweight Polartec(R) 100 fleece is soft and offers excellent insulation without bulkiness; it also dries quickly and resists pilling. Quarter-length zipper allows immediate ventilation when needed. Closeout.
short_description: Offering cozy warmth and an athletic fit, The North Face Glacier quarter-zip fleece girls' top can be worn as a sweatshirt or as a midlayer while skiing or sledding.
